infhard
Create a hardware report.
infhard
DESCRIPTION
This manual page documents briefly the infhard command.
This manual page was written for the &debian; distribution because the original program does not have a manual page. Instead, it has documentation in the &gnu; Info format; see below.
infhard is a program that creates a file, which is compressed with bzip2, with common configuration information in your desktop. infhard collects diagnose info about your system, compresses it and then place an icon on your desktop pointing to the info file.
